name: Sgt. Saunders' Combat!
overview: Sgt. Saunders' Combat! is a turn-based strategy game based on the 1960s television series originally broadcast on the ABC Television Network. Players take command of Sgt. Saunders or one of the other Axis forces during World War II fighting in Europe. The player uses turns to command units around a map, including movement, attacks, treating wounded characters, exchanging items/weapons, fixing jammed equipment or calling in an artillery strike.
